detected.title: Website avaiable in English
detected.desc: I noticed that you have your device set to English and the site supports this language. Do you want to change the language?

main.desc3: also i like playing COD and developing stuff.

me.title: üòé Who am I?
me.desc: I am an Italian guy and I like programming in Python, HTML and many other languages. Also, I can create Discord Bots, Android Apps and iOS mods.

lang.title: ‚úèÔ∏è Coding Languages
lang.desc: I know a few programming languages, from the easier ones (HTML, CSS, JS and Python) to the more complex ones (Lua).

1.title: When did you start?
1.desc1: I started when I was only 13 years old, at the time I didn't know HTML and CSS very well, in fact I made a highly disgusting site.
1.desc2: But then I improved a lot over time and now I can make nice websites (see my website at the beginning).

2.title: How many languages ‚Äã‚Äãdo you know?
2.desc: I know 5 languages, including Italian (which is my native language), English, Albanian, French and a little Spanish.

3.title: How many Google accounts you have?
3.desc: I don't know why I have so many but I own and manage 13 Google accounts. Actually there are more but that's because I haven't linked those accounts.

4.title: What phone do you have?
4.desc: My main phone is an iPhone 14. Other phones I have are Samsung S9+, Huawei P20 PRO and Samsung Galaxy Note 3. I also had an OPPO A9 2020, but I gave that to my grandfather because he didn't have a phone.

5.title: What computer do you have?
5.desc: I have a laptop from Acer which is the Nitro AN515-56. I paid for it in 2023 at around 1100‚Ç¨. Here are the technical specifications for the nerds:

6.title: How tall are you and how much do you weigh?
6.desc: I don't question why you want to know how tall I am and how much I weigh but okay... I'm 171 cm tall and weigh 70 kg.

tags.desc: Want to get little strings of text after your name on Discord? On this page you can!

avaiable.title: Avaiable Tags
avaiable.warning: Hello! I'm here to let you know that the Discord servers below are not sponsored.

howto.title: How can I have it in my server?
howto.desc1: This feature is not available to everyone at the moment. If you want to check, look at your server and if you have the 'Server Upgrades' button in the channel list at the top then it is available to you!
howto.desc2: The cost to activate the tags is 3 boosts. Sadly the free boosts included with Nitro are not enough, so you will need to have a friend boost your server at least once.
